page.title: 17Youth Club in S.on A.
page.content:
Clubs Tyler Street Youth Club meets every Wednesday from 7.30pm until 9.00pm.It costs 15p a night and after a few weeks you will be asked for a 50p membership fee.You have to be 11 to join and you leave at 13.There are about 25 members and we do various things like boating on the river, camping,barbecues,discos,and many other activities.Sometimes we go for walks but mostly we stay in the Centre.The Club itself has two pool tables,a darts board,a television,and an arcade game.There is a television room and you can buy sweets,crisps,and soft drinks.The Club is run by 4 adults (two men and two women).
We think it is very enjoyable!
